pageContext.claim: “I haven't seen anyone leaving. Nobody's left. I watch those doors. Cause a lot of times a lot of times – well, one time -- the press said, ‘People left.’ Yeah, you know where they went? To the bathroom and then they came back. … And a certain fake news deal showed a picture on the front page of these two empty seats.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump made this claim well before he finished his CPAC speech in 2019. But people do leave his events before he finishes speaking. It's just nonsense to claim that cameras are shooting empty seats while attendees go to the restroom.
